modules.description: Processes and modifies configuration files using a tree-based representation, supporting operations like finding, adding, and updating nodes. Works with a lens-based data structure that maps configuration files to a hierarchical model. Enables precise manipulation of system configurations such as adjusting SSH settings or modifying network interfaces.

This module enables manipulation of configuration trees through operations like creating, modifying, and querying nodes, along with saving changes, using path-based access to structured data. It relies on types for error handling, transformation modes, and hierarchical path representations to manage configuration data efficiently. Use cases include automated configuration updates, schema-driven transformations, and error-resilient file editing.
